field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Enable ePay Payment Solutions as a payment option.

field.label: Title
field.comment: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

field.label: Description
field.comment: The description of the payment method displayed to the customers.

field.label: API Key
field.comment: Log in to the ePay Backoffice, then go to Developers -> API keys to find the API key.

field.label: PointOfSale ID
field.comment: Log in to the ePay Backoffice, then go to Payments -> Points of Sale to find the Point of Sale ID.

field.label: Webhook Authorization
field.comment: Log in to the ePay Backoffice, then navigate to Payments -> Points of Sale -> Webhook authorization to locate the webhook authorization bearer token.

field.label: Instant capture:
field.comment: This is used if you wish to capture the payments at the same time as it is authorized. This option may only be used if the cardholder receives the goods at once.
